Intro.content: Today we close out this cycle of experiments.
Everything must eventually come to an end.
We've got one final challenge for the test subject.
They either succumb to the watery depths-
or escape to some new land.
The test subject has already set sail on their raft.
But we don't have to let them off easy.
Using the sharks, crabs and rocks provided, we can put a stop to them.
It's time to give us a worthwhile experiment.

Escaping.content: The test subject is getting away!

Capsized.content: And there goes another test subject.
Subsumed back into the endless ocean.
Whatever role we take in life, in death we are all equal.
At the end, we all go into the unknown-
regardless of what happens in life.

Survived.content: So they were allowed to escape.
They will continue on their own journey now.
To eventually meet their end someplace else...

Outro.content: So that's it for this set of experiments-
But our work is not done yet.
